name: Nocturnal Visit
description:
Game time: around 10 minutes.

Nocturnal Visit it's a short PSX horror experience. One late night, you decide to explore this unknown abandoned house hidden in the woods to make an article for your blog. Several rumours say the house is haunted. Your objective/job is to investigate the house to find clues to whether the rumours are real or not.

Controls:

MouseLookW, A, S, DMoveShiftRunEInteractFFlashlightSpaceClose UIEscapePause

This is the first game we've ever published, we are aware that it's not perfect but we are happy to release it, I hope you enjoy it. And if you want to support our developing journey, consider donating!
